game.memory

Class Save

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.memory.Save

  • public class Save
extends java.lang.Object
    This class merges all information of game that should be saved and save them in the folder of users as a text file with username of player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Save(GameState state, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String finishState, java.lang.String gameNum)
      Saves game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String saveInformation()
      Saves information as a text file in defined path.
      void setCards()
      Sets information which is necessary to show a card.
      void setInformation()
      Sets all necessary information to save them in a text file.
      void setLawMower()
      Sets lawn makers state based on their row and x coordinate.
      void setPlaygroundInfo()
      Sets flowers state and their life state, by getting their hashmap from game state.
      void setSun()
      Sets dropping time, x and y coordinate of sun
      void setZombiesState()
      Sets x coordinate and row of all zombies which are in the playground.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Appends all information and make a string that should be saved in file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

        state - as gameState
        userName - as name of the player
        finishState - , gameOver / endOfGame / notFinished
